hpnicfRcr.name: hpnicfRcr

revisions.description: The modified revision of this MIB module. Rewrite the whole MIB.

hpnicfRcr.description: This MIB is applicable to router-devices. It's made for RCR (Resilient Controllable Routing). RCR provides an effective resolution which can dynamically auto-adjust outbound traffic to the optimal external interface by monitoring the performance and traffic load of each external interface. It provides the functions of intelligentized traffic load distribution and the optimal external interface selection. This can optimally utilize the external interfaces. Furthermore, RCR realized the function which can select the optimal external interface based on different classes of operation flow.

hpnicfRcrMRAllMaxUsedBandRate.name: hpnicfRcrMRAllMaxUsedBandRate
hpnicfRcrMRAllMaxUsedBandRate.description: The max used band rate of all external interfaces on member router-devices(MRs) which are controlled by RCR.

hpnicfRcrMRAllMinUsedBandRate.name: hpnicfRcrMRAllMinUsedBandRate
hpnicfRcrMRAllMinUsedBandRate.description: The min used band rate of all external interfaces on MRs which are controlled by RCR.

hpnicfRcrMRListenTime.name: hpnicfRcrMRListenTime
hpnicfRcrMRListenTime.description: The persistent time of a probe on member router-device(MR) which is controlled by RCR.

hpnicfRcrMRStateTable.name: hpnicfRcrMRStateTable
hpnicfRcrMRStateTable.description: This table contains state information of each MR which is controlled by RCR.

hpnicfRcrMRName.name: hpnicfRcrMRName
hpnicfRcrMRName.description: The name of MR which is controlled by RCR.

hpnicfRcrMRState.name: hpnicfRcrMRState
hpnicfRcrMRState.description: The state of MR where identified on the controller router-device(CR). down: The MR has been enabled but has not connected to the CR with TCP connection. up: The MR has already successfully connected to the CR but has not been ready for adjusting route. controlled: The MR has already passed the consultation with the CR and could be controlled by it.

hpnicfRcrMRAuthType.name: hpnicfRcrMRAuthType
hpnicfRcrMRAuthType.description: The authentication type of communication packet between CR and MR.

hpnicfRcrMRAuthPwd.name: hpnicfRcrMRAuthPwd
hpnicfRcrMRAuthPwd.description: The authentication password of communication packet between CR and MR. Reading this object always results in an OCTET STRING of length zero; authentication may not be bypassed by reading the MIB object.

hpnicfRcrMROutIfStateTable.name: hpnicfRcrMROutIfStateTable
hpnicfRcrMROutIfStateTable.description: This table contains the external interface states of each MR which is controlled by RCR.

hpnicfRcrMROutIfName.name: hpnicfRcrMROutIfName
hpnicfRcrMROutIfName.description: The name of external interface on each MR.

hpnicfRcrMROutIfState.name: hpnicfRcrMROutIfState
hpnicfRcrMROutIfState.description: The state of external interface on each MR.

hpnicfRcrMROutIfMaxUsedBandRate.name: hpnicfRcrMROutIfMaxUsedBandRate
hpnicfRcrMROutIfMaxUsedBandRate.description: The max spendable bandwidth rate on external interface.

hpnicfRcrMROutIfMinUsedBandRate.name: hpnicfRcrMROutIfMinUsedBandRate
hpnicfRcrMROutIfMinUsedBandRate.description: The min spendable bandwidth rate on external interface.

hpnicfRcrMROutIfUsedBandRate.name: hpnicfRcrMROutIfUsedBandRate
hpnicfRcrMROutIfUsedBandRate.description: The used bandwidth rate on external interface.

hpnicfRcrCRState.name: hpnicfRcrCRState
hpnicfRcrCRState.description: The state of the CR which is controlled by RCR. down: The CR has been enabled but has not started a TCP connection server. init: The CR has started a TCP connection server and has been waiting for MR connection, but has not been ready for adjusting route. active: The CR is ready for adjusting route.

hpnicfRcrCRPortNum.name: hpnicfRcrCRPortNum
hpnicfRcrCRPortNum.description: The communication port number between CR and MR.

hpnicfRcrCRCtrlMode.name: hpnicfRcrCRCtrlMode
hpnicfRcrCRCtrlMode.description: The observe mode or control mode is configured to operate in the CR. observe: The CR monitors prefixes and external interfaces based on default and user-defined policies and then reports the status of the network and the decisions that should be made but does not implement any changes. controlled: The CR monitors prefixes and external interfaces based on default and user-defined policies and then reports the status of the network and the decisions that should be made and implement any changes.

hpnicfRcrCRChooseMode.name: hpnicfRcrCRChooseMode
hpnicfRcrCRChooseMode.description: The algorithm used to choose an alternative external interface for a prefix. good: The first external interface that conforms to the policy is selected as the new external interface. best: Information is collected from all external interfaces and the best one is selected even though the best external interface may not be in-policy.

hpnicfRcrCRKeepaliveTime.name: hpnicfRcrCRKeepaliveTime
hpnicfRcrCRKeepaliveTime.description: The interval time of the transmission of the keepalive communication packet between CR and MR.

hpnicfRcrCRPolicyMode.name: hpnicfRcrCRPolicyMode
hpnicfRcrCRPolicyMode.description: The chosen policy mode which decides to change what prefix. prefix: An RCR policy is designed to select IP prefixes or to select RCR learn policies using a match clause and then to apply RCR policy configurations using a set clause. operation: To deside to adjusted prefixes based on operation which user configured. study: To learn and optimize prefixes based on the highest throughput or the highest delay.

hpnicfRcrCRStudyMode.name: hpnicfRcrCRStudyMode
hpnicfRcrCRStudyMode.description: The mode of collecting prefix in studying configuration mode. It's to collect either the prefix of max thoughtout or the prefix of max delay time. It doesn't have a value when CR isn't in studying configuration mode.

hpnicfRcrCRStudyIpPrefixNum.name: hpnicfRcrCRStudyIpPrefixNum
hpnicfRcrCRStudyIpPrefixNum.description: The max number of collecting prefix in studying configuration mode.

hpnicfRcrCRIpPrefixLen.name: hpnicfRcrCRIpPrefixLen
hpnicfRcrCRIpPrefixLen.description: The mask length of collecting prefix in configuration mode.

hpnicfRcrCRRcrPolicyTable.name: hpnicfRcrCRRcrPolicyTable
hpnicfRcrCRRcrPolicyTable.description: This table contains objects to get statistic information of interfaces on a device.

hpnicfRcrCRRcrPlyID.name: hpnicfRcrCRRcrPlyID
hpnicfRcrCRRcrPlyID.description: The ID of RCR policy which the user has configured.

hpnicfRcrCRRcrPlyMatchIPListName.name: hpnicfRcrCRRcrPlyMatchIPListName
hpnicfRcrCRRcrPlyMatchIPListName.description: The matched IP prefix list name of RCR policy which the user has configured.

hpnicfRcrCRRcrPlyMatchStudyEnable.name: hpnicfRcrCRRcrPlyMatchStudyEnable
hpnicfRcrCRRcrPlyMatchStudyEnable.description: Whether the RCR policy which the user has configured is matched for studying prefix mode.

hpnicfRcrCRRcrPlyMatchOperPlyName.name: hpnicfRcrCRRcrPlyMatchOperPlyName
hpnicfRcrCRRcrPlyMatchOperPlyName.description: The matched operation policy name of RCR policy which the user has configured.

hpnicfRcrCRRcrAclNumber.name: hpnicfRcrCRRcrAclNumber
hpnicfRcrCRRcrAclNumber.description: The matched acl number of RCR operation policy which the user has configured.

hpnicfRcrCRRcrPlyDelayTime.name: hpnicfRcrCRRcrPlyDelayTime
hpnicfRcrCRRcrPlyDelayTime.description: The absolute maximum delay time. The range of values that can be configured is from 1 to 10000.

hpnicfRcrCRRcrPlyLossRate.name: hpnicfRcrCRRcrPlyLossRate
hpnicfRcrCRRcrPlyLossRate.description: The packet loss percent of prefix which the CR concerns.

hpnicfRcrCRMatPrefixPerfTable.name: hpnicfRcrCRMatPrefixPerfTable
hpnicfRcrCRMatPrefixPerfTable.description: This table contains the matched prefix performance information.

hpnicfRcrCRMatPrefPerfAddrType.name: hpnicfRcrCRMatPrefPerfAddrType
hpnicfRcrCRMatPrefPerfAddrType.description: The destination IP addresses type of matched prefix which the CR wants (IPv4 or IPv6).

hpnicfRcrCRMatPrefPerfDestIPAddr.name: hpnicfRcrCRMatPrefPerfDestIPAddr
hpnicfRcrCRMatPrefPerfDestIPAddr.description: The destination IP address of matched prefix which the CR wants.

hpnicfRcrCRMatPrefPerfDestMaskLen.name: hpnicfRcrCRMatPrefPerfDestMaskLen
hpnicfRcrCRMatPrefPerfDestMaskLen.description: The destination IP address mask length of matched prefix which the CR wants.

hpnicfRcrCRMatPrefPerfDelayTime.name: hpnicfRcrCRMatPrefPerfDelayTime
hpnicfRcrCRMatPrefPerfDelayTime.description: The absolute maximum delay time of prefix which the CR has configured.

hpnicfRcrCRMatPrefPerfLossRate.name: hpnicfRcrCRMatPrefPerfLossRate
hpnicfRcrCRMatPrefPerfLossRate.description: The packet loss percent of prefix which the CR has configured.

hpnicfRcrCRMatPrefPerfThroughput.name: hpnicfRcrCRMatPrefPerfThroughput
hpnicfRcrCRMatPrefPerfThroughput.description: The bandwidth of prefix which the CR has monitored.

hpnicfRcrCRAdjustPrefixTable.name: hpnicfRcrCRAdjustPrefixTable
hpnicfRcrCRAdjustPrefixTable.description: This table contains objects to get adjusted prefix information which the CR controlled.

hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefDestAddrType.name: hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefDestAddrType
hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefDestAddrType.description: The IP address type of the adjusted prefix which CR controlled (IPv4 or IPv6).

hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefDestAddr.name: hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefDestAddr
hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefDestAddr.description: The IP address of the adjusted prefix which CR controlled.

hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefMaskLen.name: hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefMaskLen
hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefMaskLen.description: The IP address mask length of the adjusted prefix which CR controlled.

hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefPreMRName.name: hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefPreMRName
hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefPreMRName.description: The name of the MR which the previous outbound traffic flows through.

hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefPreOutIfName.name: hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefPreOutIfName
hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefPreOutIfName.description: The name of the external interface on the MR which the previous outbound traffic flows through.

hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefCurMRName.name: hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefCurMRName
hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefCurMRName.description: The name of the MR which the current outbound traffic flows through.

hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefCurOutIfName.name: hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefCurOutIfName
hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefCurOutIfName.description: The name of the external interface on the MR which the current outbound traffic flows through.

hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefPersistTime.name: hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefPersistTime
hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefPersistTime.description: The persisting time from the time which the adjusted outbound traffic has been adjusted by CR to now.

hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefAgeTime.name: hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefAgeTime
hpnicfRcrCRAdjuPrefAgeTime.description: The time which the adjusted prefix remains.
